subject: [Radiance-general] sky luminance distribution
body:
Hi Johannes,


You need to use the brightdata format.  How to do it for the
Krochmann (145 patch) sky scanner is described in Chapter 3 found here:

http://www.iesd.dmu.ac.uk/~jm/zxcv-thesis/

Should be easy enough to adapt for other patch distributions.

-John
